thing-type.label: MH-P311 MCO Home Dimmer Switch
thing-type.description: MCO Home Dimmer Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWall Dimmer Switch </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtINCLUDING the device into Z-Wave network:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtSet the controller into INCLUSION mode. Follow instructions provided by controller manufacturer.</li&gt <li&gtPress the key on the panel 3 times in quick succession (within approx 1.5sec).</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtNote: Check the controller or gateway to see whether inclusion is successful. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtEXCLUDING the device from Z-Wave network:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtSet the controller into EXCLUSION mode. Follow instructions provided by controller manufacturer.</li&gt <li&gtPress the key on the panel 3 times in quick succession (within approx 1.5sec).</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtNote: Check the controller or gateway to see whether exclusion is successful. The exclusion will delete all association data. </p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: State Saved?
parameter.description: Dimmer state saved or not when power down<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 not saved，Dimmer will be off</p&gt <p&gtwhen powered again</p&gt <p&gt0x01 saved，Dimmer will keep the same</p&gt <p&gtstate when powered again</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Beep
parameter.description: Beep<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 Beep disabled</p&gt <p&gt0x01 Beep enabled</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: LED Backlit Brightness Level
parameter.description: LED Backlit Brightness Level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 LED disabled</p&gt <p&gt0x01~0x0A Min level-Max level</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: ALL ON/ALL OFF
parameter.description: ALL ON/ALL OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 forbid ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF</p&gt <p&gt0x01 forbid ALL ON, allow ALL OFF</p&gt <p&gt0x02 allow ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF</p&gt <p&gt0xFF allow ALL ON, allow ALL OFF</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Minimum brightness level
parameter.description: Minimum brightness level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1~98 percentage brightness level</p&gt <p&gtThe max level should always higher than min level</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Maximum brightness level
parameter.description: Maximum brightness level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt2~99 percentage brightness level</p&gt <p&gtThe max level should always higher than min level</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: 1st AG: reports device’s dimming state. It supports only one Node ID. A controller/gateway SHOULD be associated to this AG.

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Basic Set Command
parameter.description: Basic Set Command<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt2nd AG: to control the associated devices synchronously. When S1’s state changes, it will send “Basic Set Command” to these devices. It supports upto 5 Node IDs.</p&gt

parameter.label: 3: Multi-level Set Command
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtAG: to control the associated devices synchronously. When S1’s state changes, it will send</p&gt <p&gt“Multi-level Set Command” to these devices. It supports upto 5 Node IDs.</p&gt
